MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: GIS, Quick Look, Spotlight, cover flow, preview, ESRI Shape, DEM, SRTM
English.Char_Desc_45: Plugins to show GIS data in the Finder.
English.Char_Desc_80: GISLook and GISMeta are plugins that show GIS data in the OS X Finder.
English.Char_Desc_250: GISLook and GISMeta are plugins for Mac OS X 10.5 that show GIS data in the Finder. Supported formats: ESRI Shape, E00, ArcInfo Coverage, USGS DEM, SRTM, ESRI ASCII grid, ESRI Binary grid, BIL, BIP, BSQ, Surfer Grid, PGM.
English.Char_Desc_450: GISLook and GISMeta are plugins for Mac OS X 10.5 that show GIS data in the Finder. Use GISLook to browse and preview GIS data in Finder windows, including Cover Flow and Quick Look windows. Use GISMeta to view the size of GIS raster grid files. Supported formats: ESRI Shape, E00, ArcInfo Coverage, USGS DEM, SRTM, ESRI ASCII grid, ESRI Binary grid, BIL, BIP, BSQ, Surfer Grid, PGM.
English.Char_Desc_2000: GISLook and GISMeta are plugins for Mac OS X 10.5 and 10.6 that show GIS data in the Finder. Use GISLook to browse and preview GIS data in Finder windows, including Cover Flow and Quick Look windows. Use GISMeta to view the size of GIS raster grid files. Supported formats: ESRI Shape, E00, ArcInfo Coverage, USGS DEM, SRTM, ESRI ASCII grid, ESRI Binary grid, BIL, BIP, BSQ, Surfer Grid, PGM.
